snippet.title: Elon Musk Kids Rules - You might be suprised by the type of father that Elon Musk is !
snippet.description:
Take a look into the family life of Elon Musk  - Tesla & SpaceX CEO - , the world’s richest man, including his two ex wives and his six kids. You will wonder what type of lifestyle do Elon’s privileged kids live, and you might be suprised by the type of father that Elon Musk is. 

#ElonMusk, #RichKids, #AdAstra

Wheter you want to learn about our Rich Journey to the Billionaire Lifestyle of famous celebrities, or about the Richest Tech Entrepreneur like Elon Musk Tesla & SpaceX CEO or TOP 10  Athletes and other mind blowing people on the Forbes list , how they spends their millions , what supercar or expensive sports car they drive, House Tour in the most expensive Real Estates in the world, money topics like tsla & bitcoin, and even some of the most mind-blowing tech news and top 10 engineering discoveries - we've got you covered.

BILLIONAIRE Elon Musk may have his hands full running various companies such as Tesla and SpaceX, but he also has six children to look after. If Elon  has a trip for Tesla to China, for example, he bring the kids with him and they’ll go see the Great Wall or they took the bullet train from Beijing to Xian and saw the Terracotta Warriors. 
Elon Musk Tesla & SpaceX CEO first child, Nevada Alexander Musk, was born in 2002, two years after he married Canadian author Justine Wilson Elon Musk’s Ex  Wife in 2000. Sadly, he died at just 10 weeks old of sudden infant death syndrome. In 2004, Musk and then-wife Justine  welcomed twins Griffin and Xavier.The twins, who are now 17, were conceived through In vitro fertilisation. The former couple's triplets Kai, Saxon and Damian Musk were born in 2006  and they too were conceived through In vitro fertilisation . On May 5, 2020, Elon Musk and his partner Grimes singer song writer  announced the arrival of their little boy.The pair initially named their newborn child  X Æ A-12.

Due to his innovative and eccentric nature, Musk did not want to take his children to a traditional elite school. "I hated going to school when I was little, it was torture," confessed Musk, who was bullied as a child in South Africa. So in 2014 he decided to found his own school - named Ad-Astra -with his own methodology , supported by a former teacher at the Mirman School for Gifted Children , located in Beverly Hills, Los Angeles, which his children used to attend. 
Elon Musk’s kids are also fortunate enough to have a wealthy father that can afford to take them anywhere around the world. …. And beyond … As Elon Musk just bought a ticket to space from fellow space billionaire Richard Branson’s Virgin Galactic. Elon’s sons growing up with a whole set of experiences that quiet luxurious and unusual for most kids their age.
